title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from South America (similar -105)", 1853
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center right:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  2 - Brilliant white clouds / below the mountains - All the / distance in blue shadow.
description: Horizontal view containing at upper left a man's hat, a bust-length fontal view of a man, at upper center a botanical study, at center left the back of a man's head and shoulders, at center a botanical study, at center right a botanical study, and across lower margin a mountain landscape with a river bank and clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from South America (similar -105)", 1853.
1853. Graphite on grey paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-869-b.
